title: Unable to use abilities
body: Sometimes whenever i hop into a game i spawn in and i cant use any abilities or switch my camera to locked screen. I can type in the chat when i have the glitch i just can't use abilities. In order to fix it i have to completely log out of league, log back in and rejoin the game. Sometimes the people in the game have already remade it so i get leaver buster over this. Does anyone know how to fix it?

replies.body:
There might be some corruption with your settings that's failing to respond to your inputs.  Hop into a custom for now and see if a reset might help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
